publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1324.1 Christine Grahame: Netherdale Campus Textile Design Course-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1324) in the name of Ms Rosemary Byrne, leave out from "the Vice-Principal" to end and insert, "Mr Jim Wallace, Minister for Enterprise and Lifelong Learning, to intervene and secure an arrangement with Heriot-Watt University that will ensure continuation of textile design courses in the home of Scottish textiles."

S2M-1324.1 Christine Grahame: Netherdale Campus Textile Design Course-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1324) in the name of Ms Rosemary Byrne, leave out from "the Vice-Principal" to end and insert, "Mr Jim Wallace, Minister for Enterprise and Lifelong Learning, to intervene and secure an arrangement with Heriot-Watt University that will ensure continuation of textile design courses in the home of Scottish textiles."
